title: Need to ID these faces
content:
Sorry for the small sample. Any help appreciated!

Thanks,

Alberto

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221171050im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typeid_6464.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Unknown 50's Futura-like sans - Vogue {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221171050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16240 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Typewriter font in "Vitamin D - new perspectives in drawing" - Everson Mono {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221171050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38400 "Go to next forum topic")
author: apocalypso

comments.content: The olive green is almost certainly a Univers (around the 65/75 mark) (or a copy/derivative).

Better version [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221171050/http:/www.franchise.org/uploadedFiles/Franchise_Industry/Events/PreConv08%20Broch11-7.pdf).

The 48 has petit serifs.
